articles.description: RUSTON, La. – No. 16 NC State baseball made a statement in its first game of the NCAA Ruston Regional on Friday afternoon, downing third-seeded Alabama, 8-1, at J.C. Love Field at Pat Patterson Park in Ruston, La.
